    • init

      public static void init()
      Initializes the CryptoUtils by creating a CryptoDAO and loading the CryptoModel.

    • getKeyFromPassword

      public static SecretKey getKeyFromPassword(String password) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeySpecException

    • getKeyFromPassword

      public static SecretKey getKeyFromPassword(String password, String salt) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      This method generates a SecretKey from a given password and salt. It uses the PBKDF2WithHmacSHA256 algorithm to generate a key specification from the password and salt. The key specification is then used to generate a SecretKey.
      Parameter:
      password - The password to be used for generating the SecretKey.
      salt - The salt to be used for generating the SecretKey.
      Gibt zurück:
      The generated SecretKey.
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the specified algorithm is not available.
      InvalidKeySpecException - If the specified key specification is inappropriate.

    • getKeyFromPassword

      public static SecretKey getKeyFromPassword(String password, byte[] salt) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      This method generates a SecretKey from a given password and salt. It uses the PBKDF2WithHmacSHA256 algorithm to generate a key specification from the password and salt. The key specification is then used to generate a SecretKey.
      Parameter:
      password - The password to be used for generating the SecretKey.
      salt - The salt to be used for generating the SecretKey.
      Gibt zurück:
      The generated SecretKey.
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the specified algorithm is not available.
      InvalidKeySpecException - If the specified key specification is inappropriate.

    • encrypt

      public static String encrypt(String input) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • encrypt

      public static String encrypt(String input, SecretKey key) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      Encrypts a given input string using a given SecretKey.
      Parameter:
      input - The string to be encrypted.
      key - The SecretKey to be used for encryption.
      Gibt zurück:
      The encrypted string.
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • decrypt

      public static String decrypt(String cipherText) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • decrypt

      public static String decrypt(String cipherText, SecretKey key) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      Decrypts a given cipher text using a given SecretKey.
      Parameter:
      cipherText - The cipher text to be decrypted.
      key - The SecretKey to be used for decryption.
      Gibt zurück:
      The decrypted string.
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • encryptObject

      public static SealedObject encryptObject(Serializable object) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, IOException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      IOException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • encryptObject

      public static SealedObject encryptObject(Serializable object, SecretKey key) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, IOException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      Encrypts a given Serializable object using a given SecretKey.
      Parameter:
      object - The Serializable object to be encrypted.
      key - The SecretKey to be used for encryption.
      Gibt zurück:
      The encrypted object as a SealedObject.
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      IOException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • decryptObject

      public static Serializable decryptObject(SealedObject sealedObject) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, ClassNotFoundException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException, IOException
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      ClassNotFoundException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      IOException

    • decryptObject

      public static Serializable decryptObject(SealedObject sealedObject, SecretKey key) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, ClassNotFoundException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException, IOException
      Decrypts a given SealedObject using a given SecretKey.
      Parameter:
      sealedObject - The SealedObject to be decrypted.
      key - The SecretKey to be used for decryption.
      Gibt zurück:
      The decrypted object as a Serializable.
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      ClassNotFoundException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      IOException

    • login

      public static void login(String password) throws Exception
      Logs in the user by decrypting the test string with the provided password. If the decrypted string matches the expected value, the database is and can be decrypted.
      Parameter:
      password - The password provided by the user.
      Löst aus:
      Exception - If the login fails or the database cannot be decrypted.

    • setupDBEncryption

      public static void setupDBEncryption(String password) throws Exception
      Sets up the database encryption by encrypting the test string with the provided password. If the encryption is successful, the database is encrypted.
      Parameter:
      password - The master password provided by the user.
      Löst aus:
      Exception - If the setup fails or the database cannot be encrypted.

    • createMasterUser

      public static void createMasterUser(String password)
      Creates the master user aka admin user with the provided password.
      Parameter:
      password - The password for the master user.

    • loginAsUser

      public static void loginAsUser(String user, String password)
      Logs in as a specific user by decrypting the test string with the provided password. If the decrypted string matches the expected value, the database is decrypted.
      Parameter:
      user - The username of the user.
      password - The password provided by the user.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalStateException - If the login fails or the database cannot be decrypted.

    • promptToChangePassword

      public static boolean promptToChangePassword(User user, String masterPw)
      This method prompts the user to change their password. It checks if the user exists and if the database is encrypted. If these conditions are met, it shows a dialog for the user to enter a new password.
      Parameter:
      user - The user who needs to change their password.
      masterPw - The master password of the db.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the operation is successful, false otherwise.

    • checkPassword

      public static boolean checkPassword(String password)
      This method checks if a password meets the requirements. The requirements are: at least 8 characters, at least 1 uppercase letter, at least 1 lowercase letter, at least 1 number, and at least 1 special character.
      Parameter:
      password - The password to be checked.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the password meets the requirements, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentUser

      public static User getCurrentUser()
      Returns the current logged-in user.
      Gibt zurück:
      The current User object.

    • createNewUser

      public static User createNewUser(User newUser, String password)
      Creates a new user with the provided password.
      Parameter:
      newUser - The new User object to be created.
      password - The password for the new user.
      Gibt zurück:
      The created User object.

    • deleteUser

      public static boolean deleteUser(User userToDelete)
      Deletes a user from the database.
      Parameter:
      userToDelete - The user to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the user is successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • hasUser

      public static boolean hasUser(Connection connection, User user)
      Checks if a user exists in the database.
      Parameter:
      connection - The database connection.
      user - The user to be checked.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser(User user, String username, String firstname, String surname, String password, boolean needsToChangePw)
      Updates the details of a user in the database. The method checks if the user is logged in and if the database is encrypted. If these conditions are met, it updates the user's username, firstname, surname, password, and the flag indicating if the user needs to change their password.
      Parameter:
      user - The User object to be updated.
      username - The new username for the user.
      firstname - The new firstname for the user.
      surname - The new surname for the user.
      password - The new password for the user.
      needsToChangePw - The flag indicating if the user needs to change their password.

    • setNewPassword

      public static String setNewPassword(User user, String masterPw, String newPassword)
      Sets a new password for a user.
      Parameter:
      user - The user who wants to change their password.
      newPassword - The new password of the user.
      Gibt zurück:
      A string message indicating the result of the operation.

    • encryptDB

      public static boolean encryptDB()
      Encrypts the database by creating encrypted versions of all eligible tables and storing the encrypted data.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the encryption is successful, false otherwise.

    • decryptDB

      public static boolean decryptDB()
      Decrypts the database by decrypting the data in the encrypted tables and restoring it to the original tables.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the decryption is successful, false otherwise.

    • clearEncryptedTables

      public static boolean clearEncryptedTables()
      Clears all encrypted tables in the database.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the operation is successful, false otherwise.

    • logout

      public static boolean logout()
      Logs out the user by encrypting the database and clearing the original tables.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the logout is successful, false otherwise.

    • isDBEncrypted

      public static boolean isDBEncrypted()
      Checks if the database encryption is finalized.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the database is encrypted, false otherwise.

    • setDBEncrypted

      public static void setDBEncrypted(boolean isDBEncrypted)
      Sets the database encryption status.
      Parameter:
      isDBEncrypted - The new status of the database encryption.

    • getAllTablesForEncryption

      public static String[] getAllTablesForEncryption()
      This method retrieves all the table names from the database that are eligible for encryption. It filters out the 'crypto' table as it should not be encrypted.
      Gibt zurück:
      An array of table names that are eligible for encryption.

    • getAllTablesForDecryption

      public static String[] getAllTablesForDecryption()
      Retrieves all the table names from the database that are eligible for decryption.
      Gibt zurück:
      An array of table names that are eligible for decryption.
